title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating workload modernization using next generation agentic AI (PEX203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用下一代智能体AI加速工作负载现代化 (PEX203)
abstract: This session will focus on how AWS is leveraging generative AI tools to accelerate the migration and modernization of workloads either to AWS or running on AWS. This session will explore the latest agentic AI tools from for VMware, .Net, Mainframe, Java, and SQL Server. Additionally, we will cover how these tools are enabling AWS Partners to integrate with AWS tools, and third party ISV tools.
abstract_cn: 本次会议将重点介绍 AWS 如何利用生成式 AI 工具加速工作负载迁移和现代化改造，无论是迁移到 AWS 还是在 AWS 上运行。本次会议将探讨针对 VMware、.NET、大型机、Java 和 SQL Server 的最新代理式 AI 工具。此外，我们还将介绍这些工具如何帮助 AWS 合作伙伴与 AWS 工具以及第三方 ISV 工具进行集成。

presenter.name: Keith Groom
presenter.title: WW Migration & Modernization Partner GTM Strategy Leader
